short_summary: The contract is for the supply of various ESDC and Service Canada standard envelopes, including shipping services.
description: The contract is for the supply of various ESDC and Service Canada standard envelopes, including shipping services for distribution in Canada.
duration_in_months: Our contract will be for ~40 months, to be finalised, with duration starting from the day of contract to March 31, 2025, inclusive. The requirement applies to the issues accessible under the BEI Accord: Basic Terms Checklist
full_summary:
# Printing Services for Standard Sized ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes
## Overview

Employment Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites contractors to submit proposals for printing services for a variety of standard-sized envelopes and shipping services. The contractor will print and deliver the products in full quantities, according to the Statement of Work (SOW).

## Description

The contract requires ESDC and Service Canada standard envelopes to be printed in various quantities and distributed to ESDC offices and other locations across Canada. The contractor must ensure the quality control of the print products and distribution to final destinations.

## Contract Duration and Requirements

The contract duration is expected to be from December 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The contractor must respect the delivery date as stipulated in the Request for Proposal.

## Evaluation Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the responsible bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: cb-555-59740872
* Amendment Number: 8
* Solicitation Number: 100024782
* Publication Date: October 26, 2023
* Tender Closings Date: November 21, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

## Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:

* Patrick Blais
* nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* (000) 000-0000

## Attachments

The following documents are available for download:

* rfp100024782.pdf
* amendment1-rfp100024782.pdf
* amendment2-rfp100024782.pdf
* ... (list of attachments)
